fumble.effect: trip, roll DEX or fall.
fall, roll DEX or lose primary weapon.
fall and drop primary weapon, roll DEX or be stunned for 1 round.
fall and become stunned for 1 round.
fall, drop primary weapon and be stunned for 1 round.
fall, drop primary weapon and be stunned for 1d4 rounds.
fall, knocked head on the floor, uncounscious for 1d4 rounds.
weapon disarmed by opponent and thrown d10 meters in random direction.
weapon or appendage breaks or is broken.
twisted ankle, 1/2 move.
twisted knee, 1/4 move
twisted wrist, weapon hand incapacitated, drop weapon.
opponent steps on foot, go last next round.
helm twists, blind till end of next round, roll again if no helm.
wrong move, opponent's next attack has +4 to hit you.
knuckles hit, -4 to hit till end of next round.
armor piece knocked off, lose 2 AC till fixed.
opponent's parry hits groin, 1/2 move, -4 to hit for 3 rounds.
opponent's parry hits funny bone in weapon arm, -2 damage for 3 rounds.
dirt blind one eye, -1 to hit till cleaned.
dirt blind both eyes, -3 to hit till cleaned.
hit self, normal damage
hit self, normal damage and stunned for 1 round.
hit self, double damage.
hit self, double damage and stunned for 1 round.
hit self, critical hit.
hit friend, normal damage.
hit friend, normal damage and friend stunned for 1 round.
hit friend, double damage.
hit friend, double damage and friend stunned for 1 round.
hit friend, critical hit.
roll twice on fumble table, if this comes up again re-roll.
roll three times on fumble table, if this comes up again re-roll.
roll three times on fumble table, if this comes up again add two more rolls.
